name: Captain Godherdt
Lore: 'Elite fleet engineer. Technically brilliant. Key operator of magnetic signature sensors monitoring Star Destroyer hulls.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of any capital starship he pilots. While aboard a Star Destroyer, adds 1 to armor, adds 1 to hyperspeed and, once during each of your move phases, may cancel Landing Claw at same system or sector.',
